column3: 1 Cut-Cut 1/4 block or 3 ounces of fresh tofu into large cubes (about 1 in x 1 in
2 pat-pat tofu dry with a towel
3 Add-Add 1 tablespoon of olive oil to a non-stick pan
4 add-add the tofu cubes to the pan
5 add-add 1/4 tsp salt to the pan
6 Turn-Turn on the heat to medium
7 Cook-Cook 5 to 6 minutes until tofu cubes are lightly browned on the bottom
8 remove-Briefly remove the pan from the heat to reduce spitting
12 remove-Briefly remove from the heat again
13 drizzle-drizzle 1 tablespoon soy sauce (watch for spitting) on the pan
14 drizzle-drizzle with the 1 tablespoons sesame oil on the pan
18 cook-cook pan for 2 minutes until the colour is darkened
